Field.Description: Register each attack parameter ID. → Attack type / Attack material / Physical attack power / Magic attack power / Stamina attack power / Knockback distance.
Enter the SFX ID for [Bullet]. -1 does not occur.
[Impact] Enter the SFX ID. -1 does not occur.
[At the time of repelling] Enter the SFX ID. -1 does not occur.
Time for missiles to continue to exist (-1 is infinite).
Distance at which attenuation begins (not actual flight distance).
Specify how many seconds the missile will be fired.
Downward gravity within range.
Gravity applied downward when damping begins (expresses the feeling of falling down.
The distance to the target to stop the guidance. A parameter that prevents you from hitting too much with a guided bullet.
Initial speed of SFX.
Acceleration within SFX range.
Acceleration when SFX goes out of range.
maximum speed.
Minimum guaranteed speed.
Until this time, do not accelerate (make sure you can shoot magic like rockets).
How many meters should the guidance start?
Set the radius of the hit ball.
Maximum radius of the hit sphere (If -1, make it the same as the initial radius / default)
The time when the radius of the range expands to a small extent.
Time from landing to explosion (if 0, it explodes immediately).
It is accurate if it is 0. At the time of shooting, each component of XYZ should be aimed by shifting this amount.

Field.DisplayName: Time to live in damage hit history [s]
Field.Description: Damage hit history survival time [sec] (<= 0.0f: indefinite)
External force applied in the direction of shooting. (Y-axis is removed)

Field.DisplayName: Special effects on the person who shot
Field.Description: Special effects on the person who shot
Parameters used by the funnel to search for the target
Specify the ID when generating a new bullet parameter from the bullet parameter
Register each special effect parameter ID. → General special effects.
Register each special effect parameter ID. → General special effects.
Register each special effect parameter ID. → General special effects.
Register each special effect parameter ID. → General special effects.
Register each special effect parameter ID. → General special effects.
The number of missiles fired at one time.
How many corrections per second? ..
Specify how many times the missile is fired forward.
When firing multiple missiles, specify how often to fire them. (Y-axis)
When firing multiple missiles, specify how often to fire them. (X-axis)

Field.DisplayName: Physical attack power attenuation rate [% / s]
Field.Description: Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.

Field.DisplayName: Magic attack power attenuation rate [% / s]
Field.Description: Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.

Field.DisplayName: Flame attack power attenuation rate [% / s]
Field.Description: Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.

Field.DisplayName: Electric shock attack power attenuation rate [% / s]
Field.Description: Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.
Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.
Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.
Additional elevation angle from the horizontal.
Limit angle when facing the lock direction
Ratio to add the previous movement direction to the current direction when the sliding bullet hits the wall
Set the physical attributes to set for the bullet
Set special attributes to set for bullets
Specify what the attack attribute is
Used for SFX / SE during attack
If it is ON, it will penetrate without landing when it hits the character.
If it is ON, it will penetrate without landing when hitting a dynamic / partial destruction asset.
Specify the condition to judge whether to generate a bullet when it lands or the life is extinguished
Follow-up type. "Do not follow" is the default.
Source type. Usually from Damipoli. (Introduced to judge meteo)
Set whether bullets such as arrows will remain stuck in the character
Do you keep hitting?
If it is ON, it will penetrate without landing when hitting a hit / static asset.

Field.DisplayName: Are you an enemy or an ally?
Field.Description: Are you an enemy or an ally? (Not a wandering ghost)

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to share the hit list?
Field.Description: Specify whether to share the hit list
Do you use the same Damipoly ID more than once when placing bullets?

Field.DisplayName: Does it hit other bullets forced erasure A?
Field.Description: Does it hit other bullets forced erasure A?

Field.DisplayName: Does it hit the other bullet forced erasure B?
Field.Description: Does it hit the other bullet forced erasure B?

Field.DisplayName: Do you hit the force magic?
Field.Description: Do you hit the force magic?

Field.DisplayName: Whether to ignore the effect at the time of water collision
Field.Description: Should I ignore the effect if it hits the surface of the water?

Field.DisplayName: Whether to ignore the state transition at the time of water collision
Field.Description: Whether to ignore the state transition even if it hits water

Field.DisplayName: Do you hit the dark force magic?
Field.Description: Do you hit the dark force magic?
Damage calculation side. During multiplayer, the damage calculation is for switching between the giving side and the receiving side.
Whether to automatically follow when not locked on

Field.DisplayName: For synchronous bullets, do you recalculate at the Damipoli position?
Field.Description: In the case of a synchronously generated bullet, the emitter attitude at the time of synchronization is used without recalculating the attitude due to the Damipoli position when the bullet is generated.

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to overwrite the owner with the reference direction of the bullet?
Field.Description: Only valid for sub-bullets. If it is ON, the reference direction is the owner.

Field.DisplayName: Will SFX be taken over by the child bullets?
Field.Description: Take over the SFX of the parent bullet. Ignore the SFX ID set for the sub bullet

Field.DisplayName: Dark attack power attenuation rate [% / s]
Field.Description: Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.

Field.DisplayName: Bullet SFX extinction type at the time of landing
Field.Description: Bullet SFX extinction type when landing or playing

Field.DisplayName: Bullet SFX extinction type at the end of life
Field.Description: Bullet SFX extinction type at the end of life
Vertical offset of landing position. Shift the target position up and down at the time of launch and during homing. (-N ~ n)
Upper limit of random number of firing angle (0 to 360)
Upper limit of firing elevation random number (0 to 360)
Bullet ID used when making bullets at regular intervals
Minimum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (0 to n)
Maximum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (function is disabled if 0 to n 0)
Average speed observation time of predicted shooting function (function is invalid if 0 to 40)

Field.DisplayName: Waiting time for start of specified interval [s]
Field.Description: Waiting time to start making bullets at regular intervals

Field.DisplayName: The type of SFX attitude generated from the bullet
Field.Description: Set the initial attitude of an SFX or sub-bullet created from a bullet

If it is 0, it is unused. If the upper limit is reached when creating a bullet set in the same group Id, that bullet will not be created. (Bullets created synchronously on the network will be released regardless)

Field.DisplayName: Will the speed be taken over by the submunition?
Field.Description: Take over the speed of the timing to replace the submunition. Ignore the speed set for the submunition

Field.DisplayName: Do not play landing SFX when character / OBJ hits
Field.Description: When ON, the bullet parameter "landing SFX" does not play even if it hits a character / object.

Field.DisplayName: Launch position Makes a wall digging judgment by skipping a ray that connects the center of the character in parallel.
Field.Description: There was a problem with the digging judgment when firing a bullet, so it is for error handling. SEQ23101 [Own character] If you use a soul short arrow or a strong soul short arrow in close contact with a character with a high lock-on position, the direction of the bullet will be reversed.
Do you hit flare magic?

Field.DisplayName: Do you use primitive magic Atari?
Field.Description: Do you use primitive magic Atari? It will change to a filter that corresponds to the Atari dedicated to primitive magic.

Field.DisplayName: The number of funnels on the PC does not fluctuate due to reason
Field.Description: The number of funnels on the PC does not fluctuate by force. Become the number of shots

Field.DisplayName: Does it react to AI bullets (even with 0 attack power)?
Field.Description: Does it react to AI bullets (even with 0 attack power)?
The range of bullets used when the source type is set to occur at random locations.
Funnel tracking position_base point height [m]

Field.DisplayName: Asset number generated at the time of landing
Field.Description: The number of the asset to be generated at the time of landing. -1: Do not generate. The asset number is the last 6 digits of the asset. Example: AEG999_999 = 999999
Add a random number of seconds with a set time fluctuation range to the "lifetime [s]".
Only the X-axis component of the inductive performance is changed. Do not change with -1
Ballistic calculation type
Effect type to attach
Insert SE ID1 for [Bullet]. -1: Not generated 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.
Insert SE ID 2 for [Bullet]. -1: Not generated 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.
Insert SE ID 1 for [landing]. -1 does not occur. 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.
[At the time of repelling] Enter SE ID1 for. -1 does not occur. 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.
[Curly fire] The lower limit [deg] with the firing elevation angle as a reference (0 deg) before applying the curve fire calculation.
[Sky firing] The upper limit [deg] based on the firing elevation angle (0deg) before applying the bending firing calculation.
[Song firing] The minimum speed limit for song firing calculation [m / s].
[Song firing] Maximum speed limit for song firing calculation [m / s].

Field.DisplayName: SFXID [At the time of forced erasure]
Field.Description: SFX ID at the time of forced erasure. -1 does not occur.

Field.DisplayName: Bullet SFX extinction type at the time of forced erasure
Field.Description: Bullet SFX extinction type at the time of forced erasure
pad3

Field.DisplayName: SFX direction specification when following Damipoli
Field.Description: SFX direction specification when following Damipoli
Funnel tracking position_radius [m]

Field.DisplayName: Special effect flight distance correction magnification
Field.Description: Special effect flight distance correction magnification
Target range when unlocked (-1: Refer to "range", 0: No target)
